decks.notes: The deck revolves around using Aluren, a powerful combo enchantment, to cheat out creatures like Cavern Harpy and Baleful Strix for free. By chaining creatures together with Aluren's ability, the deck can generate immense value and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Abrupt Decay to control the board and protect the combo. The mana base is designed to support the various colors required for the deck's spells and creatures, while also including utility lands like Boseiju, Who Endures for additional protection.

The main goal of this deck is to assemble the combo of Nomads en-Kor, Cephalid Illusionist, and Dread Return to mill your entire library, bring back Thassa's Oracle, and win the game. This deck utilizes various cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder to dig for combo pieces, as well as protection in the form of Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares. Urza's Saga helps find key artifacts like Shuko to enable the combo. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Stifle and Daze to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up the combo.

This deck focuses on disrupting opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Thalia, Heretic Cathar, while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Barrowgoyf and Gloomfang Mauler. It has a strong graveyard recursion theme with cards like Reanimate and Graveyard Trespasser. The deck also utilizes cards like Opposition Agent to disrupt opponent's strategies and Ephemerate for additional value. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive game plan with a mix of lands that produce colored mana and powerful utility lands like Wasteland and Ancient Tomb.

The concept of this Legacy 1 vs 1 Combo - Doomsday deck is to quickly assemble the necessary cards to cast Doomsday and then win the game with Thassa's Oracle. The deck includes various card selection and manipulation spells to find the combo pieces, along with counterspells to protect the combo. The deck also includes mana acceleration cards like Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual to help cast Doomsday as quickly as possible. Additionally, there are some disruption spells like Duress and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan and ensure the combo can be executed smoothly.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deploy powerful threats such as Dragons and aggressive creatures while disrupting the opponent's mana base with cards like Magus of the Moon and Blood Moon. By utilizing fast mana sources like Simian Spirit Guide and Chrome Mox, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats and disruptive elements. The inclusion of cards like Chalice of the Void and Sundering Eruption further adds to the deck's disruptive and aggressive game plan, making it a formidable force in the Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana and deploying powerful threats like Progenitus and Archon of Valor's Reach. It also utilizes disruptive cards like Chalice of the Void and Endurance to slow down the opponent's game plan. With access to powerful green tutors like Natural Order and Green Sun's Zenith, this deck can quickly assemble its key pieces and overwhelm the opponent with its aggressive game plan. The inclusion of cards like The Sea Devils and Bridgeworks Battle helps to further disrupt the opponent's strategy and push through damage.

This UWx Control deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan through counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. It utilizes powerful control elements like Force of Will, Teferi, Timebender, and Murktide Regent to control the board and win the long game. The deck also includes card filtering and draw spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure consistent access to its key cards. With a mix of disruption, card advantage, and threats, this deck aims to outmaneuver and outvalue its opponent in a game of attrition.

The main idea behind this deck is to control the game by utilizing a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with cards like Force of Will, Spell Pierce, and Swords to Plowshares, while also generating card advantage with Brainstorm and Snapcaster Mage. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Vivi Ornitier provide additional value and card selection. The deck also includes powerful win conditions such as Terminus, Flame of Anor, and LÃ³rien Revealed to close out the game once it has gained control.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble a powerful combo utilizing Mystic Forge and various artifacts to generate mana and draw cards, ultimately leading to a win condition. The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly, using Mystic Forge to cast free spells from the top of the library, and utilizing cards like Urza's Saga and Karn, the Great Creator to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Glaring Fleshraker provides a strong creature presence and Kozilek's Command offers additional utility and disruption. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its combo and synergy between cards.

This deck focuses on utilizing low-cost creatures and ninjas to quickly deal damage to the opponent. With cards like Ornithopter and Baleful Strix providing early threats, the deck can easily get creatures onto the battlefield. The ninjas like Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow and Ingenious Infiltrator can then take advantage of these creatures by dealing extra damage or drawing cards. Retrofitter Foundry can also create more creature tokens for the ninjas to exploit. In addition, the deck includes disruptive spells like Force of Will and Stifle to control the game and protect its creatures.

The deck focuses on combining aggressive creature plays with disruptive spells and artifacts to control the tempo of the game. It utilizes cards like Ensoul Artifact and Urza's Saga to quickly build a strong board presence, while also running counter spells like Force of Will and Force of Negation to disrupt the opponent's plays. The inclusion of Ninjas like Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares allows for additional card advantage and utility. The deck aims to efficiently close out games by combining aggression with disruption.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bringing them back into play for a massive advantage. The goal is to use cards like Entomb and Reanimate to cheat out powerful threats like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier ahead of schedule, overwhelming the opponent with high-impact creatures. The deck also includes interaction and protection with cards like Force of Will and Daze, allowing the player to disrupt the opponent's strategy while executing their own game plan.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize, before bringing them back into play with Reanimate and Animate Dead. The strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with large, game-winning creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while disrupting their game plan with cards like Force of Will and Daze. The deck also includes some tempo plays with Brazen Borrower and Murktide Regent to control the board. The key concept is to cheat big creatures into play early and close out the game before the opponent can respond effectively.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures, such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize. The goal is to then bring these creatures back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead, overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats. The deck also includes disruptive elements like counterspells (Force of Will) and removal (Fatal Push) to protect the combo and control the board. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Brazen Borrower and Orcish Bowmasters for added versatility and flexibility in dealing with opponent threats.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly playing aggressive creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent while disrupting the opponent's strategy with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze. The deck aims to control the game by efficiently removing threats with Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card draw and Brazen Borrower offers additional tempo plays. The deck also includes some cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure consistency. Wasteland is included to disrupt the opponent's mana base, giving this deck a proactive and disruptive approach to the game.
